REGISTRATION.CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_PARA: Register your organisation to create an account and begin using our services.
REGISTRATION.CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_PARA_1: Completing the registration process will make you the administrator for your organisation’s account.
REGISTRATION.CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_PARA_2: You will need a valid company email address and
REGISTRATION.CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_LIST_3: Charity Commission for England and Wales number
REGISTRATION.CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_LIST_4: Office of The Scottish Charity Regulator (OSCR) number
REGISTRATION.CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_LIST_5: The Charity Commission for Northern Ireland number
REGISTRATION.CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_LIST_6: National Health Service Organisations Registry number
REGISTRATION.CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_PARA_6: We will request some basic information from you to establish if your organisation has previously been registered.
REGISTRATION.CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_SETUPUP_INSTR: Learn about the Public Procurement Gateway, and how to set up an account.
REGISTRATION.ENTER_DETAILS_PARA_1: Enter your name, organisation, and work email address
REGISTRATION.EMAIL_FORMAT_ERROR: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
REGISTRATION.REG_ORG_HEAD_1: Your organisation is not registered. You will need to register your organisation before you can create an individual account.
REGISTRATION.REG_ORG_PARA_1: To continue, register with us to create a secure account for your organisation and access all our services in one place. You cannot create an individual account until your organisation is registered. If you choose not to be an administrator you can nominate a colleague.
REGISTRATION.REG_ORG_HEAD_2: When you register, you will be:
REGISTRATION.REG_ORG_LIST_1: The administrator of your organisation's account
REGISTRATION.REG_ORG_LIST_2: Responsible for managing users and creating groups
REGISTRATION.REG_ORG_LIST_3: Able to edit your organisation's details
REGISTRATION.REG_ORG_LIST_4: The sole admin user, although you can add more
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_HEADER_1: Do you want to be the administrator of your organisation?
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_PARA_1: By registering your organisation, you will be the administrator for the account.
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_PARA_2: If you do not want to become the administrator
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_PARA_3: of your organisation's account you can
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_PARA_4: nominate a colleague to register to become an administrator.
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_PARA_5: This is a permanent position but can be shared with other colleagues
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_LABLE_1: I am happy being the administrator for my organisation
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_LABLE_2: I would like to nominate a colleague to register to become an administrator
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_LABLE_3: I do not know who my administrator would be
REGISTRATION.NOT_REG_RET_LINK: Return to Crown Commercial Service homepage
REGISTRATION.REG_TYPE_HEADER: Are you a supplier, buyer or both?
REGISTRATION.REG_TYPE_PARA_1: Select the organisation you work for
REGISTRATION.REG_TYPE_LABLE_TEXT_1: Your organisation is a supplier if you supply goods to CCS buyers
REGISTRATION.REG_TYPE_LABLE_TEXT_2: Your organisation is a buyer if you buy goods using CCS
REGISTRATION.REG_TYPE_LABLE_TEXT_3: Your organisation is both if you buy and sell goods using CCS
REGISTRATION.REG_SEARCH_COMP_CHAR_EW: Charity Commission for England and Wales
REGISTRATION.REG_SEARCH_COMP_OFFICE: Office of the Scottish Charity Regulator
REGISTRATION.REG_SEARCH_SPAN_1: website to search for your organisation details
REGISTRATION.REG_SELECT_LABLE_2: Yes, and the details are correct
REGISTRATION.REG_SELECT_LABLE_3: Yes, but the address is wrong
REGISTRATION.REG_ADD_PARA_1: As you are the first person registering the organisation, you will be the administrator for your organisation’s account
REGISTRATION.REG_ADD_PARA_3: nominate a colleague to register and become an administrator
REGISTRATION.ENTER_NAME_WITHOUT_NUM_SPECIAL: Enter your name without special characters or numbers.
REGISTRATION.REG_SUCCESS_PARA_2: to confirm your address. Please click on the link in that email to continue.
REGISTRATION.REG_SUCCESS_PARA_3: We've resent the activation email to
REGISTRATION.REG_SUCCESS_PARA_4: The link in the email will become invalid after 36 hours and can only be clicked on once
REGISTRATION.REG_SUCCESS_PARA_5: If you have not received an email, please click here to resend
REGISTRATION.REG_NOMINATE_HEADER_1: Nominate a colleague to register your organisation
REGISTRATION.REG_NOMINATE_HEADER_2: Enter the contact details of the colleague you’d like to nominate as the administrator for your organisation.
REGISTRATION.REG_NOMINATE_EMAIL_SUC_PARA_1: An email has been sent to
REGISTRATION.REG_NOMINATE_EMAIL_SUC_PARA_3: This person will be required to complete the organisation registration process before you can continue with your sign up process.
REGISTRATION.REG_FIND_ADMIN_PARA_1: Your administrator is someone who works for your organisation. We can't tell you exactly who your administrator is but here are a few ideas of who to ask.
REGISTRATION.REG_FIND_ADMIN_LIST_1: the person who gave you your work email account
REGISTRATION.REG_FIND_ADMIN_LIST_2: someone in your IT or HR department
REGISTRATION.REG_FIND_ADMIN_LIST_5: the person who manages your email service or website
REGISTRATION.REG_BUYER_TYPE_HERADER_1: What type of buyer are you?
REGISTRATION.REG_BUYER_TYPE_HERADER_2: To help us sign you in as fast as possible, please state what type of buyer you are. Crown Commercial Service is open to government, public sector, charity, and third party sector.
REGISTRATION.REG_ADD_WRONG_PARA: Continue creating your administrator account. Once you have set up your administrator account please get in touch with your registry owner to change your address details
REGISTRATION.REG_NOT_MY_DETAILS_PARA: Please check your organisation's details and try again
REGISTRATION.REG_NOT_MY_DETAILS_BTN: Search again with a different Registry/ID
REGISTRATION.REG_GEN_ERROR_PARA_1: An unexpected error has occured. Please try again in a few minutes
REGISTRATION.REG_GEN_ERROR_PARA_2: Search with a different organisation ID
REGISTRATION.REG_GEN_ERROR_PARA_3: This Organisation is already registered for Public Procurement Gateway. Contact your Organisation Administrator
REGISTRATION.REG_EXIST_ERROR: User already exists on Public Procurement Gateway with this email address. Please try with another email address
REGISTRATION.REG_SUCCESS: You have succesfully created an account.
REGISTRATION.REG_ERROR_NOT_FOUND: We could not find any matching records for your search. Please check the details and  try again
REGISTRATION.REG_ALRADY_EXIST_PARA: There is already an administrator for your organisation. Press ‘Continue’ to confirm that the information above is correct and request access from the administrator.
REGISTRATION.REG_DUBLICATE_PARA: More than one organisation with that name is registered. Please provide us with one of the identifying options below to proceed.
REGISTRATION.REG_ADMIN_NOTIFY_HEADER: to notify them of your request for access
REGISTRATION.REG_ADMIN_NOTIFY_PARA: Once access has been granted you will be able to continue creating your account
REGISTRATION.REG_ADD_IDEN_HEADER: We found matching records for your organisation from the additional registries below
REGISTRATION.REG_ADD_IDEN_PARA: Please unselect any that you do not want to include in your registration
REGISTRATION.REG_REG_FAIL_PARA: Organisation with this registry ID is already registered in Public Procurement Gateway

COMMON_COMPONENT.APP_NEW_SER: This is a new service – your
COMMON_COMPONENT.APP_HELP_LINK: will help us to improve it.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_BANNER_PARA_1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_BANNER_PARA_2: We’d like to set additional cookies so we can remember your settings, understand how people use the service and make improvements.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_BANNER_PARA_3: You’ve accepted additional cookies. You can
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_BANNER_PARA_6: You’ve rejected analytics cookies. You can
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_PARA_2: Go back to the page you were looking at
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_PARA_3: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_PARA_4: We use cookies to make the Public Procurement Gateway work and collect information about how you use our service.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_PARA_5: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use the Public Procurement Gateway. We do not need to ask permission to use them.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_PARA_6: With your permission, we use Google Analytics to collect data about how you use the Public Procurement Gateway. This information helps us to improve our service.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_PARA_7: Google is not allowed to use or share our analytics data with anyone.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_PARA_8: Google Analytics stores anonymised information about:
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_LIST_1: how you got to the Public Procurement Gateway
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_LIST_2: the pages you visit on the Public Procurement Gateway and how long you spend on them
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_LIST_3: any errors you see while using the Public Procurement Gateway
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_4: To handle backchannel logout (Function the Single Sign on System)
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_6: Opbs cookie (Function the Single Sign on System).
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_8: Session information (Function the Single Sign on System).
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_10: Store the refresh token (Function the Single Sign on System).
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_13: For the protection of Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_19: Used to implement the Auth0 session layer.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_21: Fallback cookie for single sign-on on browsers that don’t support the sameSite=None attribute.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_25: Fallback cookie for anomaly detection on browsers that don’t support the sameSite=None attribute.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_28: This cookie is used by our authentication service Auth0 to distinguish between humans and bots. In this way, valid reports on the use of the website can be created.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_TABLE_DATA_30: This helps us count how many people visit CCS by tracking if you’ve visited before.
COMMON_COMPONENT.COOKIE_SETTING_LABLE_1: Do you want to accept analytics cookies?
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_1: This website is run by Crown Commercial Service (CCS). We want as many people as possible to be able to use this website. For example, that means you should be able to:
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_1: change colours, contrast levels and fonts
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_2: zoom in up to 300% without the text spilling off the screen
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_3: navigate most of the website using just a keyboard
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_4: navigate most of the website using speech recognition software
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_5: listen to most of the website using a screen reader (including the most recent versions of JAWS, NVDA and VoiceOver)
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_2: We’ve also made the website text as simple as possible to understand.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_4: has advice on making your device easier to use if you have a disability.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_5: We know some parts of this website are not fully accessible:
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_6: 1.3 - Adaptable: Create content that can be presented in different ways (for example simpler layout) without losing information or structure.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_7: 1.4 - Distinguishable: Make it easier for users to see and hear content including separating foreground from background.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_8: 2.1 - Keyboard Accessible: Make all functionality available from a keyboard.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_9: 2.4 - Navigable: Provide ways to help users navigate, find content, and determine where they are.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_10: 3.1 - Readable: Make content readable and understandable.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_11: 3.2 - Predictable: Make Web pages appear and operate in predictable ways.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_12: 3.3 - Input Assistance: Help users avoid and correct mistakes.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_13: 4.1 - Compatible: Maximise compatibility with current and future user agents, including assistive technologies.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_HEADER_2: What to do if you cannot access parts of this website
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_6: If you need information on this website in a different format like accessible PDF, large print, easy read, audio recording or braille:
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_7: We’ll consider your request and get back to you in five working days.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_HEADER_3: Reporting accessibility problems with this website
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_8: We’re always looking to improve the accessibility of this website.If you find any problems not listed on this page or think we’re not meeting accessibility requirements, contact:
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_9: The Equality and Human Rights Commission (EHRC) is responsible for enforcing the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018 (the ‘accessibility regulations’). If you’re not happy with how we respond to your complaint,
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_10: contact the Equality Advisory and Support Service (EASS)
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_HEADER_5: Technical information about this website’s accessibility
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_11: Crown Commercial Service is committed to making its website accessible, in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_12: This website is partially compliant with the
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_13: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1 AA standard,
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_14: due to the non-compliances listed below.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_16: The content listed below is non-accessible for the following reasons.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_HEADER_6: Non compliance with the accessibility regulations
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_17: Issue - Using CSS to change the presentation of text to convey meaning without altering markup for assistive technologies. The error occurs in the Org title. Line 377 {{representingTag.LevelA}}
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_18: Fix - This is currently planned for improvement in forthcoming development
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_19: Issue - Autocomplete attribute missing from password input field. Line 327
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_20: Issue - Colour contrast ratio failed for the Help and Support link.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_21: Issue - Page has a small overlap when sized down to minimum width. The beta banner overlaps the {{representingTag.LevelAA}} a little. Some users who are visually impaired prefer to try and consume content in one column. In this case no overlap of content should occur.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_22: Issue - Clickable controls (as above {{representingTag.KeyboardLevelA}} links) do not have ARIA roles (role=link). ARIA roles help assistive technologies treat the element as something other than its native HTML element type.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_23: Issue - Iframes ID=rpiframe and ID=opiframe do not have title attributes.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_25: Issue - 'Cancel' is ambiguous. Cancel returns to select a user. Be more descriptive. 'Add user','Select a different user' or 'View Group' etc.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_26: Issue - No lang attribute on rplFrame.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_27: Issue - The actions on this page are present as hyperlinks rather than buttons despite them being actions rather than links.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_28: Issue - Include additional Group name validation.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_29: Issue - The submit button is disabled when the page is first loaded, but on a page where there is a minimum set of fields required, this gives a false sense of validity.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_30: Issue - There are required fields, but these are not indicated to the user until the user attempts to click submit.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_31: Issue - Document has focusable elements with the same ID. Btn-login and btn-cancel.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_LIST_32: Fix - This is currently being analysed to confirm the required resolution.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_SPAN_1: This website was last tested on 4 April 2022. The test was carried out by Kainos.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_SPAN_3: All pages that are currently available within the Public Procurement Gateway (PPG).
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_HEADER_22: What we’re doing to improve accessibility
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_17: We have created a backlog to remediate all accessibility issues on this site, and on other CCS sites. We are also working with our third party suppliers to ensure they build and design to WCAG 2.1 AA standards from now on.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_18: We plan to fix all accessibility issues on this website in our next phase of website improvement works, due for completion in October 2022.
COMMON_COMPONENT.ACCESSIBILTY_STATEMENT_PARA_19: This statement was prepared on 14 April 2022.
